(min--moz-device-pixel-ratio:2),(-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio:2),(min-resolution:2dppx),(min-resolution:192dpi){hr{border-bottom-width:.5px}}@supports (-webkit-marquee-style:slide){hr{border-bottom-width:1px}}.js-enabled .central-featured,.js-enabled .jsl10n{visibility:hidden}.jsl10n-visible .central-featured,.jsl10n-visible .jsl10n{visibility:visible}.otherprojects-icon{*zoom:1;*display:inline}.suggestion-item{*width:auto}.search-container button{*display:inline}#searchInput{*padding:8px 0 0 8px;*width:90%;*height:34px}#search-input{*display:inline}.langlist ul{*text-align:center}.langlist ul li{*display:inline!important;*padding-left:5px;*padding-right:5px}@media print{body{background-color:transparent}a{color:#000!important;background:0 0!important;padding:0!important}a:link,a:visited{color:#520;background:0 0}img{border:0}}
